Job Description: Your responsibilities will include:       Design, implement, and operate new web services using microservices technology.   Solve problems that span multiple layers of the application,   Closely collaborate with the engineering team.   Automate all the things. Eg: deployment, testing, CI, CD, etc.   Research web technology trends.   Write Unit, Integration, and User Acceptance Tests   Help the team grow professionally.   Solve technical problems of moderate scope and complexity.    Basic Qualifications         Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science or a similar degree     Ability to work in a diverse team     4+ years experience as a software developer     Proficiency in Python Programming Language       Experience building software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers.       Strong Computer Science fundamentals, including networks and communication, object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, and complexity analysis.      Strong problem-solving skills      Knowledge of professional software engineering and best practices for the full software development life cycle, including designing, coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.     Experience working in Django     Ability to work with git.
